description: It is a debate being had across the world, and now Austria and its neighbours have decided to act.
title: Coronavirus: Why you now have to wear a mask in Austrian shops
title_page: Coronavirus: Why you now have to wear a mask in Austrian shops - BBC News
maintext: But it advises that healthy people only need to wear them if they are caring for others suspected of being infected or if they themselves are coughing or sneezing. It has said the incorrect use of masks can be counterproductive, leading the wearer to become infected.
